story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Secure Architecture (SA) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Building
**Purpose:** Design secure AI system architectures

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic architecture documentation and security boundaries.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Architecture documented
  - Components and interactions mapped
  - Data flow diagrams created
  - External dependencies listed
  - Integration points identified

- [ ] Trust boundaries identified
  - User input boundary defined
  - LLM/model boundary defined
  - Tool/API boundary defined
  - Network boundaries mapped

- [ ] Least privilege applied
  - Minimal tool access configured
  - Restricted data access implemented
  - Limited network access enforced
  - Permission inventory created

- [ ] Environment separation implemented
  - Dev/staging/prod separation
  - Network segmentation (where feasible)
  - Access controls per environment
  - Data isolation verified

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Architecture diagrams published
- [ ] Security boundaries documented
- [ ] Development team trained

## OWASP Risks Addressed

- ASI02: Tool Misuse & Exploitation
- ASI07: Insecure Inter-Agent Communication
- ASI08: Cascading Failures
- LLM03: Supply Chain
- LLM06: Excessive Agency
- LLM08: Vector and Embedding Weaknesses

## Resources

- [SA Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/SA-Software-OnePager.md)

## Verifhai Integration

Use `/verifhai-practice SA` for architecture guidance.

subtasks.description: Create architecture diagrams showing components, data flows, and dependencies.
